ModMetaData.name: Racc Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018388533
- Added Royalty faction goodwill patch - Added compatibility with [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1542399915]SwimmingKit[/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr] [td][url=https://invite.gg/Mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/RaccRace][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/6KqTKks.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2288125657][img]https://i.imgur.com/kNldlMg.png[/img][/url]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img]
The Racc are a raccoon humanoid species obsessed with intelligence and espionage. Uses the Alien Framework V2.0 by Erdelf and co.
Art (Heads) by Nackblad and Xen.
[img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [/list]
